CustomField.formula: 'Kind Regards,'+ BR() + BR() + BR() + Booking__r.Course__r.Enquiries_PSA_Name__c + BR() + BR() + 'Course Organiser' + BR() + BR() + 'Telephone: ' + Booking__r.Course__r.Enquiries_PSA_Phone__c + BR() + BR() + 'Email: Any reply to this email should be sent to ' + Booking__r.Course__r.Enquiries_PSA_Email__c
CustomField.label: Email Signature
